content: Hi, everyone. I'm working on the terminology server for the FHIR IG and specification builds and with the Vocab WG and UTG project, and I'd like to take a look and review how CARIN is using terminologies. I had thought that during the Connectathon might be a good time to get started on that, but there always seems to be a few too many things to deal with. There's not too much time left today, but if it would be possible to have a chat about terminology with the group (at least some of you), that would be great, or we can look at a different time if that will be better. Let me know what you think and what might work. Thanks.
Hey @Mark Roberts Can you find a time when @Rob Hausam can talk to our IG development team about terminology use since we weren't able to get together at the Connectathon?
Yes, let me know if I can join one or more of your calls, or whatever would work best. Thanks.
If there is something that I can join with you or we can set up today or this week, that would be great.

Hello Rob. I will send you an invite. Additionally, the call information is https://leavittpartners.zoom.us/j/93372147617

The most recent recap from our call yesterday can be found here: https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=91986623
Looks like it would have been useful to join the call yesterday, but I can catch up and will join at the next opportunity.
